title: Charcoal Grey Midi Wrap Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a charcoal grey midi wrap dress, soft matte cotton-linen blend fabric, subtle herringbone texture, short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, self-tie waist belt, clean hem, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims
trims_and_details: topstitch detailing along neckline and hem
techpack: Wrap-style midi dress in cotton-linen blend with viscose lining. Short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, self-fabric waist tie, hidden side zipper. Subtle herringbone weave texture. Clean hem finish. Regular fit adjustable at waist.
design_text:
Charcoal Grey Midi Wrap Dress (DRESS-GREY-001)
Colors: charcoal grey, soft silver, graphite
Fabrics: cotton-linen blend, viscose lining
Prints/Patterns: subtle herringbone weave
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: wrap
Sleeves: short flutter sleeves
Neckline: V-neckline
Length: midi
Style / Fit: r, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , f, i, t,  , w, i, t, h,  , a, d, j, u, s, t, a, b, l, e,  , w, a, i, s, t
Trims & details: self-fabric waist tie, topstitch detailing along neckline and hem, hidden side zipper
Techpack: available
